state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, go west. After that, try to head north. And then, go west. If you can do that, go to the south. Then, try to travel west. And then, venture west. Then, attempt to take a trip north. With that done, go east. And then, go to the east. Then, go to the east. Then, attempt to take a trip south. If you can accomplish that, try to take a trip south. Following that, make an effort to head west. And then, take a trip west. Next, pick-up the coin from the floor of the closet. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Bedchamber =- Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the bedchamber. You can barely contain your excitement. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Bedchamber =-0/1
